title: Pioneering ‘YouTube Team’ Rebounds from Tour de France Snub to Earn Giro d’Italia Wild Card
content:
Social media-savvy fan favorite Unibet Rose Rockets promises to bring its unique engagement strategy to first ever grand tour.

Read the full article at Pioneering ‘YouTube Team’ Rebounds from Tour de France Snub to Earn Giro d’Italia Wild Card on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
